review: It's okay I have the fastest internet connect you can have and the movies still pause and stop once in awhile, not really that great!

review: We are still trying to learn programing so far it cool
author: wayne b.

review: It has a very pretty interface, though I would prefer if Amazon Prime had its own app, instead of being all over the place.  Hopefully one day it will get more apps. And it's annoying to have to enter my pin to do screen mirroring.Overall I prefer the Roku. The fast forward thumbnail view on the Roku, the better 5G WiFi range. And it's just  And hopefully one day it will get more apps easier to use.
author: HeyRadar

review: I love the fire stick. Meet all our needs. Easy to set up. Would recommend it to anyone.
author: Alice G.

review: My wireless system is always buffering.  Makes watching any program impossible.  I wish there was a test that you could do BEFORE you bought this to see if it would work with the system you have in your home.
author: Gravman

review: It's nice.  Very convenient - but the capability of it receiving WIFI signals is questionable.  Placed it in the TV on the main level about 20 feet from he router - flawless.  Put it in the basement about 40 feet from the router - can't find a signal - I have WIFI on the phone so I know the router can reach- but the stick can't get anything.  Just be aware of where you might use it and how far from the router.
author: Michael E. Johnson

review: This works well. It is so portable!
author: Naomi Gardner "Nbgardner"
